ARABIC: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They fulfil their vows and fear a Day whose evil will spread far and wide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Those who fulfil their vows and fear the Day whose evil shall be diffused far and wide,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: These will be the ones who fulfil their vows and dread the Day whose woe shall be spread far and wide;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The servants of God fulfill their vows and are afraid of the day in which there will be widespread terror.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They fulfil their pledges, and fear a day the evil of which is widespread.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They fulfill (their) vows, and they fear a Day whose evil will be wide-spreading.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They fulfill vows and fear a day the evil of which shall be spreading far and wide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They fulfil their vows, and fear a day whose evil is upon the wing;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Because) they perform the vow and fear a day whereof the evil is wide-spreading,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They keep their vows and fear a day the woe of which will spread far and wide;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They fulfill their vow and dread a Day the evil whereof shall be widespreading.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They fulfill their vows and fear a day whose ill will be widespread.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They perform (their) vows, and they fear a Day whose evil flies far and wide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They (are those who) fulfill (their) vows, and they fear a Day whose evil will be wide-spreading.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: they who keep their vows and fear a Day whose evil is spread;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They fulfill their vows, and dread a Day whose ill is widespread.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [76:7] They fulfil their vows, [pledged] in obedience to God, and fear a day the evil of which will be widespread.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then described their traits when they were in the life of the world, saying: (Because they perform the vow) because they fulfil their pledges and oath by Allah; it is also said this means: they perform the obligations (and fear a day) and fear the torment of a day (whereof the evil) the torment (is wide spreading,
